author: Austin Evans
description:
Check out Micro Center’s Holiday Deals: https://micro.center/8bjz
Sign up for Early Access to Micro Center’s Newest Santa Clara Location: https://micro.center/7sib
Visit Micro Center News: https://micro.center/hghp

Shop Micro Center Exclusive 7600X3D Bundle: https://micro.center/kkqa
Shop Samsung 990 Pro 2TB: https://micro.center/0c0h
Shop Sparkle Intel Arc B580: https://micro.center/q85k
Shop Cooler Master Hyper 212: https://micro.center/d3ci
Shop Powerspec 650 Watt Power Supply: https://micro.center/oxlj
Shop Montech Mid ATX Case: https://micro.center/zm0j

In this video, I head to Micro Center to build a reasonable gaming PC for around $1,000, aiming for great 1080p and 1440p performance. I focus on value and finding the best deals, ultimately choosing a Micro Center-exclusive Ryzen 5 7600X3D CPU and an Intel ARC B580 GPU for a powerful yet affordable rig. This build is one that gamers can actually put together and get great performance.

Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.c
title: The No Regrets Guide to a Gaming PC Build
